version_description: Bug fixes and performance improvements.

New Geometrics tool to realistically animate objects like stairs, floors and hallways to create architectural animations with precision on mobile.
Dull skies? Choose from a menu of stunning alternatives and then animate them with this AI-powered ‘auto’ tool.

Stock Image Search - You can now search and import free stock photos!
Sparkle Pack - New Overlays to give your loops that extra sparkle.
Sky feature now has parameters you can control!

- Sky feature now has parameters you can control!
- Improved speed and reliability of our brushes and projects.
- Export bug fix.

- Sky feature now has parameters you can control!
- Improved speed and reliability of our brushes and projects.
- Export bug fix.
- We have a new name!
Bug fix.

You can now export directly to your Instagram Story.
Export Quality has been increased.
Bug Fixes.

Use Halloween Overlays to add that spooky touch! Add bats, jack-o'-lanterns or ghosts with the press of a button.
You can now control the direction and speed of clouds in "Sky"!
Pixaloop now supports importing photos from your albums.

Bug Fixes:
Overlays now work smoothly on iPhone XS and XS Max.
Camera roll photos are displayed in the correct order when importing on iPhone X.

Pro users can now export in 4k!
Use the "Adjust" feature to fine tune your images.
Export directly to your Instagram Story/Feed.
Minor bug fixes and enhancements.

New Elements feature! Create enigmatic scenes with adjustable video elements.
Masks, masks, masks! Use eraser to remove or brush to add Overlays to certain areas.
Fresh Christmas Overlay pack to give that festive touch to your projects.

New Elements feature! Create enigmatic scenes with adjustable video elements.
Masks, masks, masks! Use eraser to remove or brush to add Overlays to certain areas.
Fresh Christmas Overlay pack to give that festive touch to your projects.

New Elements feature! Create enigmatic scenes with adjustable video elements.
Masks, masks, masks! Use eraser to remove or brush to add Overlays to certain areas.
Fresh Christmas Overlay pack to give that festive touch to your projects.
Bug fixes.

Here's what's new in this update!

New Year Overlays Pack! Celebrate the year of the pig with these festive Overlays.
New Game Day Pack! Support your favorite team with football themed Elements.

New Water Feature! Animate Oceans and lakes with the touch of button.
Fresh new Overlays: Graceful.
Brand spanking new Elements: Butterfly.

Make your iPhone look awesome - customize Live Wallpapers in your lock screen!
Use your projects as live wallpapers on your iPhone 6s/6s Plus/7/7 Plus/8/ 8 Plus/ X / XS / XS Max device!

Valentine's day is coming and Pixaloop is feeling romantic!
Feeling lovey-dovey? Add some Valentine themed Overlays to your images.

New Water Feature! Animate Oceans and lakes with the touch of button.
Fresh new Overlays: Graceful.
Brand spanking new Elements: Butterfly.
In this update we've fixed some minor bugs.
In this update we've fixed some minor bugs.

New Content! 3 new packs.
Many more to come.

New Content! 3 new packs.
Many more to come.

What's New
• You asked, we listened. Multiple Elements are finally here.
We are excited to release our most requested feature to date.
Press the "plus" icon to add up to five "Elements" per project.
• New Overlay Packs!
We will be adding more and more Elements and Overlays.
Turn on push notifications so we can tell you when that happens.

Bug Fixes
• "Water" feature is faster and better, enjoy the waves.

What's New
- You asked, we listened. Multiple Elements are finally here.
We are excited to release our most requested feature to date.
Press the "plus" icon to add up to five "Elements" per project.
- New Overlay Packs!
We will be adding more and more Elements and Overlays.
Turn on push notifications so we can tell you when that happens.

Bug Fixes
- "Water" feature is faster and better, enjoy the waves.

In this update we've fixed some minor bugs.
We're constantly working to improve the app.

In this update we've fixed some minor bugs.
We're constantly working to improve the app.
Due to popular request we added export to GIF.
Due to popular request we added export to GIF.

This update we've fixed some minor bugs.
We're constantly working to improve the app.
A brand new ultra-realistic sky pack!

This update, we've fixed some minor bugs. Some of those were discovered and reported by you, our loyal users, so if something seems out of the ordinary to you - please contact our support! We're constantly working to improve the app.

New content is on the way, we are preparing our best packs yet. Stay tuned!

Keep an eye out - we are adding brand new packs on a frequent basis.
Longing for specific Overlays, Elements, or Skies? Let us know.

This version also features a new 4:5 export ratio, and minor bug fixes.

Whats new:
- New feature : Element Mask, use masks to step up your element game.
- 4 new Element packs, expect more packs on a frequent basis. Turn on notifications to stay in the loop.
This update includes support for iOS 13, bug fixes and stability improvements.
This update includes support for iOS 13, bug fixes and stability improvements.

Hey Pixaloopers,
Ready for all the spooky scary fun of Halloween? You won’t want to miss our special Halloween collections!
We’ve also made erasing your Overlays & Effects so much speedier - so they show up where you need in a snap.
So go make some Pixaloops, you’ll be sure to be faster than those Halloween ghosts!

Yours,
The Pixaloop Team

Hey Pixaloopers!
Guess what? In this update, we’ve cleared some of those cobwebs and spiders (aka bugs), just for you.
Don’t worry, we’ve left just enough for Halloween ;)
Keep looking out for our new Collections - we’ve got something new for you every week!
Yours,
The Pixaloop Team

Hey Pixaloopers!
Guess what? In this update, we’ve cleared some of those cobwebs and spiders (aka bugs), just for you.
Don’t worry, we’ve left just enough for Halloween ;)
Keep looking out for our new Collections - we’ve got something new for you every week!
Yours,
The Pixaloop Team

Hey there!
Get excited, because with this new update come some brand new pictures to bring to life - check out new Stock options, fresh from Unsplash.
Enjoy,
The Pixaloop Team

Hello Pixaloopers!

We're feeling particularly thankful - and we're celebrating that with a new Thanksgiving Collection.
And once you've had your fill of Turkey, get ready to shop 'til you drop! Don't forget to show the world that you're Black Friday Ready.
Not up for the shopping adventure? Get cozy and add some Snowy Skies to your Pixaloops, and get excited for that first snow if you haven't gotten it already!

Yours,
The Pixaloop Team

Happy Holidays Pixaloopers!

We're bringing you some surprises this holiday season.

First of all, we have a brand new FEATURE to help you bring the Christmas magic - Effects! Starting with Dispersion, we're giving you the ability to add fantastic effects in a tap, and then adjust them with a brush. Look out for more coming your way soon!

We've also got some wonderful Christmas & Holiday Collections out there for you, so get out there and make those holiday cards.
Cheers and enjoy the holidays,
The Pixaloop Team

Happy Holidays Pixaloopers!

We're bringing you some surprises this holiday season.
First of all, we have a brand new FEATURE to help you bring the Christmas magic - Effects! Starting with Dispersion, we're giving you the ability to add fantastic effects in a tap, and then adjust them with a brush. Look out for more coming your way soon!
We've also got some wonderful Christmas & Holiday Collections out there for you, so get out there and make those holiday cards.

Cheers and enjoy the holidays,
The Pixaloop Team

Happy Holidays Pixaloopers!

We're bringing you some surprises this holiday season.
First of all, we have a brand new FEATURE to help you bring the Christmas magic - Effects! Starting with Dispersion, we're giving you the ability to add fantastic effects in a tap, and then adjust them with a brush. Look out for more coming your way soon!
We've also got some wonderful Christmas & Holiday Collections out there for you, so get out there and make those holiday cards.

Cheers and enjoy the holidays,
The Pixaloop Team

Hey Pixaloopers!

We're ready to kickoff the new year.
- The Dispersion Effect is improved for even better decorating.
- Overlays will now recognize and mask people automatically! We're making things even easier for you ;)
- Of course, we've squashed a few bugs along the way.

Stay tuned, we have a whole lot more coming for you this year!

Yours,
The Pixaloop Team

亲爱的 Pixalooper 用户：
准备好体验动态效果了吗？我说的是我们的新功能——3D 动态。
相机动态现在有了全新的含义，您可以随时尝试。
马上体验吧！

此致,
Pixaloop 团队

Hey all our Pixaloop lovers!
We're gearing up for the most lovely celebrations of the year, Valentine's day of course.
Check out our special edition Dispersion particles, full of hearts and flowers!

Yours truly,
The Pixaloop Team

嘿！
我们在此次更新中增加了一些可以精细控制的效果。
我们为喜欢水的用户增加了调节选项，让波浪和水流的效果更佳逼真。
此致
Pixaloop 团队

我们在此次更新中增加了一些可以精细控制的效果。
我们为喜欢水的用户增加了调节选项，让波浪和水流的效果更佳逼真。
此致

亲爱的 Pixalooper 用户：

在此次更新中，我们改进了一些大家喜欢的功能：
- “3D 动态”工具可以更自然地添加戏剧效果
- “色散”工具现在有两个全新选项可供您探索
- “火花”工具现在增加了画笔，您可以用独特的方式让自己绽放光芒

希望大家注意身体，继续创作！
此致
Pixaloop 团队

亲爱的 Pixaloop 用户！

我们为全新的 3D 动态功能添加了有趣的新图层，让这一功能更加激动人心。您现在可以添加更多位和片段，增加循环的位深。马上来试试吧！

我们还给您带来了新的效果 - 烟雾。如果您想消失在烟雾中，不妨试试这个效果。
不要再等待，马上开始探索吧！

除了常规更新外，我们还增加了期待已久的功能。现在您可以设置令人心动的循环。有了我们专门制作的音轨，您的循环将随您舞动。

You can now add your own music to Beatloops, and Dispersion and Sky have been improved!
We hope you like it, let us know what you think.
Yours,
The Pixaloop Team

Hey Pixaloopers,
Guess what? Pixaloop’s come full circle! We’re now called Motionleap!
Stay tuned for more,
The Motionleap Team

- A free preset for you in every Overlay, Elements, Sky and Beatloops pack
- Bug fixes and UX improvements
Yours,
